messages.title: Our plan for Britain
messages.content: Many Brighton residents are switching to back the Liberal Democrats because they're the only party with a plan for our country. The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit. Whilst the Conservatives sound like UKIP and Labour fight amongst themselves.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will fight to keep the UK in the single market and give the public not just MPs their say on the final deal.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are fighting against a hard Brexit.
issues.economy: The Conservatives will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.

contactInformation.address: GANDA MEDIA of 35 Providence PL, Brighton BN1 4GE. Published by Paul Chandler on behalf of the Liberal Democrats, at 3 Albert Villas, Hove, BN3 2S

endorsements.endorsement: We say: 'yes to the Single Market.'
What I am proposing cannot mean membership of the single market.

quotes.text: The Conservatives will take Britain out of the single market whatever the cost, putting the economy at risk.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats with a message against a hard Brexit.

leaflet.additionalNotes: VOTE LIBERAL DEMOCRAT ON 8 JUNE! A LIBERAL PARTY FOR A LIBERAL CITY!
